OB: The OK button is enabled even when there is no selection in the editor selection dialog.
EB: The OK button should be disabled when there is no selection in the editor selection dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 

1. Open the preference page and navigate to the Workbench > File Editors section. 
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, switch to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry. 
3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors'. Despite having no selection, press the OK button. This adds the selected external editor to the list.
